function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate focus on occupant health and wellness in building design","Impact":"Increased absenteeism and reduced wellness and productivity of occupants","Mitigation":"Incorporate health-related credits and academic research to prescribe measures for creating healthy workspaces","Technologies":"Building design and operational measures, company policies, behavioral changes","People":"Building designers, end-users","Owner":"Building designers, end-users"},{"Description":"Lack of integration of health and wellness requirements in Green Building Rating Systems (GBRS)","Impact":"Inadequate attention to occupant health and wellness, potential for increased health risks for occupants","Mitigation":"Incorporate more requirements for occupant health and wellness in GBRS, leverage academic research to prescribe health-related measures","Technologies":"Green Building Rating Systems, academic research","People":"Building designers, end-users, occupants","Owner":"Building designers, end-users"},{"Description":"Limited exploration of evidence-based best practices to mitigate the spread of infectious diseases within Sustainability Rating Systems","Impact":"Lack of effective measures to limit the spread of infectious diseases, potential for increased risk of disease propagation","Mitigation":"Conduct research and develop evidence-based best practices to mitigate the spread of infectious diseases within Sustainability Rating Systems","Technologies":"Research, evidence-based practices","People":"Researchers, building designers, end-users","Owner":"Researchers, building designers"}]}
